meanings.definition: The process of diminishing or reducing swelling or tumescence.
meanings.sent1: After the injury, the detumescence of the swollen ankle was gradual.
meanings.sent2: The detumescence of the inflammation brought relief to the patient.
meanings.sent3: The detumescence of the balloon made it easier to fit through the door.
meanings.sent4: As the storm passed, the detumescence of the waves calmed the sea.
meanings.sent5: The detumescence of the anger in his voice was evident as he spoke softly.

meanings.definition: The act of subsiding or decreasing in intensity or size.
meanings.sent1: The detumescence of the fever indicated the beginning of recovery.
meanings.sent2: With each passing day, the detumescence of the storm brought clearer skies.
meanings.sent3: The detumescence of the music's volume made it easier to focus on studying.
meanings.sent4: The detumescence of the excitement in the room signaled the end of the party.
meanings.sent5: The detumescence of the tension in the air was palpable as everyone relaxed.
